title: Lamb baked in a crust with fresh peas, onions and pancetta
ingredients: 200g/7oz prosciutto (such as parma ham), cut into strips 5mm/¼in thick and 6cm/2½in long
a few sprigs of rosemary, 6cm/2½in long
salt and freshly ground black pepper
100g/3½oz freshly grated parmesan or pecorino cheese
500g/1lb 1½oz fresh peas, shelled weight, or 500g/1lb 1½oz frozen petits pois
